EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Secure, Hybrid Banking Reference Architectures for Cloud-Native Applications white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: Security and Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/security-and-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> - Analyst Report: Refocusing Security in the DevOps Era: Enabling 'Secure by Default' <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/refocusing-security-in-the-devops-era]]> - eBook: Embarking on the Cloud-Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]> - Topic Page: Cloud Native Security: Reduce Risk in the Enterprise <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security]]> - Documentation: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Reference Architectures for Public Clouds and Your Data Center <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/refarch/index.html]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog Post: Developer-Ready Infrastructure with Pivotal Cloud Foundry and VMware NSX <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/developer-ready-infrastructure-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-vmware-nsx]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
